square.power

Class RegularPower

  • java.lang.Object
    • square.power.Power
      • square.power.RegularPower
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MovableEffect

    public class RegularPower
extends Power
    This power lasts infinite amount of turns and actions. Untill it may experience a power failure.
    Author:
    vincentreniers
